context_bundle.summary: Circuit breaker pattern prevents cascading failures: Monitor error rate, open circuit (reject requests) when threshold exceeded, half-open (test recovery) after cooldown, close circuit when healthy. Three states: Closed (normal), Open (failing fast), Half-Open (testing).
